articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Twitch streamer Myth moving to YouTube in exclusive deal
articles.description: Ali Kabbani, who goes by Myth online, is a former Fortnite pro leaving Twitch to stream exclusively on YouTube

articles.author: Nicole Carpenter
articles.title: Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune will stream nonstop online
articles.description: Netflix removed Jeopardy! from its service last year, but the show is coming back online on a different streamer. Pluto TV will broadcast Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune 24/7, according to Vulture.
articles.content: Jeopardy! is reportedly returning to a streaming service after Netflix took the show off the platform last year. Vulture reported Monday that both Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune the game show classic… [+1194 chars]

articles.author: Zosha Millman
articles.title: Here’s why you can’t listen to Lofi Hip Hop Beats streams right now
articles.description: You can still buy Lofi Girl merch, and Lofi study music is still available across the internet. But the Lofi Girl Youtube channel (formerly ChilledCow) got hit with a false DMCA claim, causing the stream to get (temporarily) taken down.

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Joker’s running for mayor in the new Harley Quinn trailer
articles.description: Harley Quinn is back — Nightwing broodily narrates, Poison Ivy has a master plan, and Joker runs for mayor! The HBO Max series’ release date is July 28.

articles.author: Petrana Radulovic
articles.title: Halo Infinite’s co-op actually isn’t out today actually — but it’s coming
articles.description: Halo Infinite’s co-op beta didn’t come out July 11, but it is still expected to come out sometime this week. Players need to sign up for the Xbox Insiders Program to access it.
articles.content: The beta release of Halo Infinites campaign co-opt didnt actually come out today. The highly anticipated feature is still on the way, but 343 Industries community director Brian Jarrard clarified the… [+928 chars]

articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Assassin’s Creed Liberation HD will remain playable on Steam, Ubisoft confirms
articles.description: The game’s listing reads it will “no longer be accessible” from Sep. 1, when online features are due to be turned off, but Ubisoft says offline features will still be available
articles.content: Concerns were raised this weekend that people who had bought Assassins Creed Liberation HDon Steam would have their access to the game removed, after it was noticed that the games Steam listing read … [+3443 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Battlefield 3 Reality Mod for PC launch date announced
articles.description: The makers of the Battlefield 3 Reality Mod for PC say their highly anticipated work will launch July 17, 2022. A copy of the game on PC and all of its DLC is needed.
articles.content: Seven years of work delivers an all new Battlefield 3 for PC players

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Apex Legends single-player FPS spinoff revealed by career listing
articles.description: A career listing on Respawn Entertainment’s website has revealed an interesting new project for the studio: a single-player, first-person shooter set in the Apex Legends universe.
articles.content:
It appears that Apex Legends will be getting a new, single-player, first-person shooter spinoff, according to job listings on Respawn Entertainments official site, first reported by Dexerto.

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: League of Legends’ latest music is a Star Guardian album starring Taliyah
articles.description: The newest Sessions, a League of Legends music project that creates ambient albums around champions, is centered around Star Guardian Taliyah during this summer’s magical girl event.

articles.author: Ryan Gilliam
articles.title: Genshin Impact shows off the Fatui Harbingers in trailer for 3.0 update
articles.description: Genshin Impact’s story is complex and filled with characters. And in a new cutscene teasing the game’s upcoming 3.0 update, Fatui Harbingers like Pierro, Rosalyne, Arlecchino, and Pantalone appear to be planning something big
articles.content: The Sumeru updates story is already starting to get spicy
